Description: number of enrolled patients who are CTA+ and randomly assigned to treatment or control
the total number of screened patients with valid CTA results (eligible for bridging study)
number of CTA+ and CDx+ out of n1
number of CTA+ patients enrolled in bridging (concordance) study
number of CTA- and CDx+ out of n0
number of CTA- patients enrolled in bridging (concordance) study
single-arm objective response rate in subgroup CDA+ and CDx+
proportion of delta2/delta1, where delta2 is efficacy in CDA- and CDx+
